definition: paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc
"silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
see 月氏[Yue4 zhi1] and 閼氏|阏氏[yan1 zhi1]
papercutting (Chinese folk art)/to make paper cutouts
a piece, scrap or fragment of paper

sentences.english: Fig1. Paper is staple food supposing office is restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 如果辦公室是個餐館，紙應該是每天消耗最多的主食。

sentences.english: Now lift up your weight and put the second section on top.
sentences.chinese: 拿開你的重物，放上第二頁紙。

sentences.english: I stared at the sheets of paper lying facedown on the printer.
sentences.chinese: 我盯着打印機裏面朝下擱着的一摞紙。

sentences.english: All these records can add up to a nice stack of paper.
sentences.chinese: 所有的這些備份文件積攢起來便成了厚厚一堆紙。

sentences.english: Janet pulled the page from her typewriter and looked nervously at her wrist-watch.
sentences.chinese: 簡尼特從她的打字機裏抽出紙，緊張地看了看手錶。

sentences.english: Moreover, this strain was confirmed to be lactic acid type yeast by paper chromatography and gas chromatography.
sentences.chinese: 紙層析和氣相色譜法表明該酵母的產酸類型爲乳酸。

sentences.english: Beer paper trademark appeared about in middle 18th century.
sentences.chinese: 啤酒紙商標的出現大約是在18世紀中葉。

sentences.english: A single sheet of paper from Konan's body becomes a paper airplane.
sentences.chinese: 小南的身體飛出一張紙變成了紙飛機。

sentences.english: He tear outed a morceau paper .
Homes are often decorated with cutouts of Chinese auspicious phrases and couplets.
sentences.chinese: 衡宇往往粉飾紙剪紙吉祥的中文詞組和對子。

sentences.english: There is a yellow pad on the table - SHE has read it a number of times.
sentences.chinese: 桌子上有一個黃色便籤紙，她已經反覆讀過很多遍了。

sentences.english: Learn how to fold an origami samurai hat.
sentences.chinese: 學習如何折一折紙武士帽。

sentences.english: She took up a sheet and ratcheted it into the typewriter.
sentences.chinese: 她拿起一張紙，把它嘩嘩啦啦地塞到打字機中。

sentences.english: Please line the drawers with clean paper after you have emptied them.
sentences.chinese: 請把抽屜倒空後鋪上乾淨紙。

sentences.english: You can make a dress from this paper pattern.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用這個紙樣兒做一套衣服。

definition: to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip
forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount
original poster (in an online forum)/landlord of a building (traditional)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
improbable/unlikely/will not (act, happen etc)/not able/not having learned to do sth/(coll.) (Tw) don't mention it/not at all
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
